ancestors.header: Procession of scriptures in the fields

nested_captions.content: Procession of scriptures in the fields is a ritual at the center of which is the circumambulation of the canon around the fields.

summaries.content: A procession of scriptures in the fields is usually a multi-faceted (sometimes multiple-day) ritual affair, at the center of which is the circumambulation of the canon (housed in the local temple) around the fields.

nested_descriptions.title: Procession of Scriptures in the Fields
